sentence.Network_en: Anti-malarial vaccines are now under-going trials.
sentence.Network_cn: 抗疟疾的疫苗正在试验阶段。

sentence.Network_en: Malarial poison had sallowed his skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 疟疾病毒使他皮肤成灰黄色.

sentence.Network_en: Standing water like this gives malarial mosquitoes the perfect place to breed.
sentence.Network_cn: 像这样的死水给了传染疟疾的蚊子绝佳的繁殖地点.

entry.def: You can use malarial to refer to things connected with malaria or areas which are affected by malaria.
